overview: In addition to overseeing Braveheartâ€™s finance function, Colin serves as Company Secretary for the Group. He joined Braveheart in 2008 from Digital Bridges Ltd, a leading global provider of mobile entertainment software applications to the mobile telecommunications industry. At Digital Bridges Colin was Chief Financial Officer and Company Secretary, and before that Chief Operating Officer. Prior to his role at Digital Bridges, Colin worked as Finance Director at Vision Group plc, a LSE listed Edinburgh University technology spin-out which pioneered CMOS imaging.
